translation: (zmyn th āsman kis sạrise kaynats) ttasrae tuln vajinụ̄ shdyd hytth th ggrae.
So (pth chyzs) ttasrae tuln vajinụ̄ shdyd hytth th ggrae kya chhe?
Th tohyhi kya chuhv samujh mut zi (pth chyzs) ttasrae tuln vajinụ̄ shdyd hytth th ggrayhi nishhi kya chuh murad?
(aamhi nishhi) chuh (murad) suh qyamtuk doh yymhi doh (sạry) lukh spdn chhkravnh āmtyn pvnpryn hndụ̄ pạtthụ̄.
Th pharr gczhn rng brng dvnnh āmthi phmbkụ̄ pạtthụ̄.
Pth suh shkhṣ yymụ̄ sndụ̄ (ʿmln hndụ̄) pạtrụ̄ gobụ̄ āsn.
Suh āshi khosh krvnis ʿạshs mnz.
Th yas shkhṣh sndụ̄ (aʿmaln hndụ̄) pạtrụ̄ lotụ̄ āsn.
Tmụ̄ sund tthkanh āshi haviyh (jhnmuk chah).
Th tohyhi kya chuhv smjh mut zi havyh kya chuh?
(suh) chuh skht vuhvun nar (yʿny jhnm kh vuhvnhi naruk sytthah son chah).
